channel.title: Fiddling with numbers
channel.description: Recent content on Fiddling with numbers

item.description: Syed. Al, Huang, Y., Goh, J., Moroz, S., Pugsley, J., Waite, N.M., Houle, S. K. D. (2024), “The Association between Academic Performance and Entry-to-Practice Milestones within a Co-Operative Education PharmD Program”, Pharmacy, 12.

Goh, J., Atchinson, D.A., Campbell, C.W.“Imaging the retina at optimal pupil sizes significantly improves resolution and contrast in those with diabetes.” Biophotonics Congress: Optics in the Life Sciences 2023 (OMA, NTM, BODA, OMP, BRAIN), Technical Digest Series (Optica Publishing Group, 2023), paper DTh2A.

item.title: Collections No.1
item.description: Articles about learn in public, brag document and free stuffs. Learn In Public If there’s a golden rule, it’s this one, so I put it first. All the other rules are more or less elaborations of this rule #1.
Chhibber, N., Goh, J., and Law, E. (2022) “Teachable Conversational Agents for Crowdwork: Effects on Performance and Trust”, CSCW 2022.

item.title: Retinal Image Quality in Diabetic Patients
item.description: Last year, I met with Rahim, Kaleb and Melanie to discuss how to analyze the data about the eye’s optic. It was an educational moment for me when I found that human vision is different between those with and without diabetes.

item.title: Teachable Conversational Agents
item.description: What a great start to the year! Our paper about teachable conversational agents in crowdwork is accepted to CSCW. Congratulations Nalin! It has been a pleasure to join the team on this long journey.
Lee, K. J., Chauhan, A., Goh, J, Nilsen, E., and Law, E. (2021) “Curiosity Notebook: The Design of a Research Platform for Learning by Teaching”, CSCW 2021. Ceha, J., Lee, K.

item.title: Curiostiy Notebook
item.description: Hooray! We submitted the camera-ready version of the paper on Curiosity Notebook for CSCW 2021 to ACM. Congratulations Ken Jen and team for letting me participate in such amazing work!

item.title: Humourous Conversational Agent
item.description: Congratulations to Jessy Ceha for her CHI 2021 paper that was awarded Best Paper Honorable Mention.
